mapper.select: select (select mem_no from tb_member_basic where mem_no = mem_no_star) memNo ,(select mem_id from tb_member_basic where mem_no = mem_no_star) memId ,(select mem_nick from tb_member_basic where mem_no = mem_no_star) memNick ,DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as regDate from tb_member_fanstar where mem_no_star = #{memNo}
